05 Nov 2019, 02:09 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Indeks Harga Saham Gabungan (IHSG) dibuka positif pagi ini. IHSG terus naik 28 poin (0,49%) ke level 6.210.Nilai tukar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS) terhadap rupiah pagi ini berada di level Rp 14.025.Pada pra perdagangan, IHSG naik 24 poin (0,39%) ke 6.204. Indeks LQ45 naik 5,8 poin (0,60%) ke 982.Membuka perdagangan Selasa (5/11/2019), IHSG terus naik 28 poin (0,49%) ke level 6.210. Indeks LQ45 naik 6 poin (0,62%) poin ke 981.Mengutip Artha Sekuritas, bursa Amerika Serikat (AS) ditutup Menguat. Dow Jones ditutup 27.462,11 (+0,42%), NASDAQ ditutup 8.433,20 (+0,56%), S&P 500 ditutup 3.078,27 (+0,37%). Bursa AS ditutup menguat setelah adanya kejelasan dari potensi tanda tangan perjanjian dagang antara AS-China. Hal tersebut dilontarkan oleh sekretaris perdagangan AS Wilbur Ross yang akan memberikan lisensi kepada Huawei untuk menjual di AS dalam waktu dekat. Ini memberikan kepercayaan pada investor bahwa ekonomi global akan lebih stabil bila perang dagang AS-China mulai terlihat jalan keluarnya. Selain itu hasil dari laporan keuangan 9M19 di AS secara umum lebih baik dari ekspektasi investor juga memberikan dorongan menguat bagi bursa saham.Bursa Asia pagi ini bergerak di zona hijau, berikut pergerakannya:

Indeks Nikkei 225 naik 326 poin ke 23.176
Indeks Hang Seng bertambah 15 poin ke 27.562
Indeks Shanghai naik 1,08 poin ke 2.976
Indeks Strait Times menguat 3,3 poin ke 3.241

Not bad, JCI Opened Strengthening Thin to 6,210
05 Nov 2019, 02:09 by Ardan Adhi Chandra


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - The Composite Stock Price Index (CSPI) opened positively this morning. JCI continued to rise 28 points (0.49%) to the level of 6,210. The exchange rate of the United States dollar (US) against the rupiah this morning was at the level of Rp 14,025. In pre-trade, JCI rose 24 points (0.39%) to 6,204. The LQ45 index rose 5.8 points (0.60%) to 982. Opening trading on Tuesday (11/05/2019), the JCI continued to rise 28 points (0.49%) to 6,210. The LQ45 index rose 6 points (0.62%) points to 981. Quoting Artha Sekuritas, the United States (US) exchange closed strong. The Dow Jones closed 27,462.11 (+ 0.42%), NASDAQ closed 8,433.20 (+ 0.56%), the S&P 500 closed 3,078.27 (+ 0.37%). US markets closed higher after clarity on the potential for a US-China trade agreement. This was stated by US trade secretary Wilbur Ross, who will give a license to Huawei to sell in the US in the near future. This gives investors confidence that the global economy will be more stable if the US-China trade war begins to appear. In addition, the results of 9M19 financial statements in the US were generally better than investors' expectations and also gave a stronger boost to the stock market. Asian Stock Exchange this morning moved in the green zone, following its movements:

The Nikkei 225 index rose 326 points to 23,176
The Hang Seng Index added 15 points to 27,562
The Shanghai index rose 1.08 points to 2,976
The Strait Times Index advanced 3.3 points to 3,241
